source_code: const Header = styled.div` width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; `; const Title = styled.div` font-size: 24px; line-height: 33.6px; `; const Form = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 4px; `; const Input = styled.input` width: 100%; `; const TextArea = styled.textarea` width: 100%; `; const ButtonRow = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; gap: 4px; `; const typeStr = "efiz.near/type/shirts"; const type = Type.get(typeStr); State.init({"material":"","brand":"","color":"","size":"","sleeve":"","collar":""}); function composeData() { const data = { thing: { main: JSON.stringify(state), }, index: { tempeverything: JSON.stringify({ key: "main", value: { type: typeStr, }, }), }, }; return data; } return ( <> <Header> <Title>{typeStr.split("/")[2]}</Title> </Header> <Form><Input placeholder="material" onChange={({ target }) => State.update({ "material": target.value })} /> <Input placeholder="brand" onChange={({ target }) => State.update({ "brand": target.value })} /> <Input placeholder="color" onChange={({ target }) => State.update({ "color": target.value })} /> <Input placeholder="size" onChange={({ target }) => State.update({ "size": target.value })} /> <Input placeholder="sleeve" onChange={({ target }) => State.update({ "sleeve": target.value })} /> <Input placeholder="collar" onChange={({ target }) => State.update({ "collar": target.value })} /><ButtonRow> <CommitButton force data={composeData} onCommit={resetThing} > create </CommitButton> </ButtonRow> </Form> </> );
